thread.title: BAPE Gets Cute with a Hello Kitty and My Melody Collab for Valentines Day
thread.title_full: BAPE Gets Cute with a Hello Kitty and My Melody Collab for Valentines Day

author: Kam Dhillon
title: BAPE Gets Cute with a Hello Kitty and My Melody Collab for Valentines Day
text:
Previous Next 
With Valentines Day quickly approaching, A Bathing Ape has done the good work and continued its long-time collaboration with Sanrio (the global purveyors of kawaii Japanese pop-culture) to make sure you have something obscenely adorable to gift your loved ones on V-day. 
The Japanese streetwear legend most recently tapped Sanrio empress Hello Kitty for a capsule collection which saw the quintessential, kawaii feline plastered over everything from hoodies to t-shirts. 
This time around, BAPEâ€™s long-running graphic mascot Baby Milo joins Sanrio characters Hello Kitty and My Melody for a special collection of T-shirts adorned with chocolates and hearts. 
Hello Kitty x My Melody x A Bathing Ape will launch on February 11 and will be online available at BAPE stores, as well as other select locations.
